attributes.action: accept this petition and its signatories as a vote of No Confidence from the Electorate and step down now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many lies, taxes, fines, restrictions on our movements, freedoms of speech, and persistent refusal to deal with national problems in the quest for unendorsed EU dominance have made the people of Britain suspicious distrustive of this Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
